pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo anācāraṁ ācarati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.7: “kiṁ nu kho nāma tumhe, āvuso, maṁ vattabbaṁ maññatha?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.11: Seyyathāpi nāma mahāvāto vāyanto tiṇakaṭṭhapaṇṇasaṭaṁ ekato ussāreyya, seyyathā vā pana nadī pabbateyyā saṅkhasevālapaṇakaṁ ekato ussāreyya;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.12: evameva tumhe nānānāmā nānāgottā nānājaccā nānākulā pabbajitā ekato ussāritā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.13: Kiṁ nu kho nāma tumhe, āvuso, maṁ vattabbaṁ maññatha?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.17: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.18: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ karissatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.19: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ channaṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.20: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, channa, bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ karosī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.23: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ karissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.25: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.26.1: “Bhikkhu paneva dubbacajātiko hoti uddesapariyāpannesu sikkhāpadesu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ karoti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.27: ‘mā maṁ āyasmanto kiñci avacuttha kalyāṇaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā, ahampāyasmante na kiñci vakkhāmi kalyāṇaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.30: ‘māyasmā attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ akāsi, vacanīyamevāyasmā attānaṁ karotu,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.31: āyasmāpi bhikkhū vadetu sahadhammena, bhikkhūpi āyasmantaṁ vakkhanti sahadhammena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.32: Evaṁ saṁvaddhā hi tassa bhagavato parisā yadidaṁ aññamaññavacanena aññamaññavuṭṭhāpanenā’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.33: Evañca so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsitabbo tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.34: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamāno taṁ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṁ kusalaṁ;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.2: dubbaco hoti dovacassakaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgato akkhamo appadakkhiṇaggāhī anusāsaniṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.8: yaṁ bhagavatā paññattaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ, etaṁ sahadhammikaṁ nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.10: “mā maṁ āyasmanto kiñci avacuttha kalyāṇaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā, ahampāyasmante na kiñci vakkhāmi kalyāṇaṁ vā pāpakaṁ vā. Viramathāyasmanto mama vacanāyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.14: aññehi bhikkhūhi. Ye passanti ye suṇanti tehi vattabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.17: Āyasmāpi bhikkhū vadetu sahadhammena, bhikkhūpi āyasmantaṁ vakkhanti sahadhammena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.18: Evaṁ saṁvaddhā hi tassa bhagavato parisā yadidaṁ aññamaññavacanena aññamaññavuṭṭhāpanenā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.35: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ karoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.37: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.40: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ karoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.42: Saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.43: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.48: Ayaṁ itthannāmo bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ karoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.50: Saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuṁ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.51: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.53: Samanubhaṭṭho saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.59: Saṅghādisesaṁ ajjhāpajjantassa ñattiyā dukkaṭaṁ, dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā paṭippassambhanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:3.1.1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:3.1.2: Dhammakamme vematiko na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:3.1.3: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
